## D√≠a 5: Testing b√°sico

C√≥digo Clave: 

// src/features/auth/useAuthStore.ts
export const useAuthStore = defineStore('auth', () => {
  const user = ref<User | null>(null)

  const login = async (credentials: Credentials) => {
    const { data } = await api.post('/login', credentials)
    user.value = data.user
    localStorage.setItem('token', data.token)
  }

  return { user, login }
})

Sprint 5-6: CI/CD ProfesionalÓÖó

Objetivo: Configurar pipeline automatizado con m√©tricas de calidad

## D√≠a 1: GitHub Actions
- [Teor√≠a] Workflows y jobs
- [Lab] Configurar linting en PRs
- [Optimizaci√≥n] Cache de dependencias

## D√≠a 3: Lighthouse CI
- [Workshop] M√©tricas Core Web Vitals
- [Lab] Reporte automatizado en Vercel
- [Performance] An√°lisis bundle con source-map-explorer

## D√≠a 5: Deployment estrat√©gico
- [Teor√≠a] Estrategias Blue-Green
- [Lab] Configurar preview deployments
- [Proyecto] CI/CD completo

.github/workflows/ci-cd.yml: 

name: Vue Professional Pipeline
on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  quality-gate:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Run Lighthouse
        uses: treosh/lighthouse-ci-action@v9
        with:
          urls: 'http://localhost:5173'
          budgetPath: './lighthouse-budget.json'

  deploy-preview:
    needs: quality-gate
    if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
    uses: ./.github/workflows/deploy-preview.yml

## D√≠a 5: WebSockets avanzado

C√≥digo Clave: 

<!-- src/features/dashboard/ProjectChart.vue -->
<script setup>
import { useProjectStore } from '@/features/projects'

const store = useProjectStore()
const chartData = computed(() => ({
  labels: store.projects.map(p => p.name),
  datasets: [{
    data: store.projects.map(p => p.progress)
  }]
}))
</script>

Ejemplo Test: 

// tests/e2e/projects.cy.js
describe('Project Management', () => {
  it('Creates new project', () => {
    cy.login()
    cy.visit('/projects/new')
    cy.get('[data-test="project-name"]').type('Nuevo Proyecto')
    cy.get('[data-test="submit"]').click()
    cy.contains('Proyecto creado').should('be.visible')
  })
})

<RecycleScroller
  :items="largeArray"
  :item-size="54"
  key-field="id"
>

    <!-- Renderizado eficiente -->

Kit de Supervivencia VueÓÖó

1. **Debugging Guide**
   - `console.log` no basta: Vue Devtools Timeline
   - Diagn√≥stico de memory leaks: Chrome Memory Tab

2. **Performance Cheatsheet**
   - Optimizar re-renders: `v-memo`
   - Carga perezosa: `defineAsyncComponent()`

3. **Vue Patterns Book**
   - State management: Patr√≥n "Shared State"
   - Composici√≥n: Custom hooks (`useFetch`)

R√∫brica de Evaluaci√≥n FinalÓÖó

| Criterio             | Peso | Herramienta Validaci√≥n       | Meta                     |
|----------------------|------|------------------------------|--------------------------|
| Funcionalidad        | 40%  | Cypress (100% specs pasan)   | 40/40 puntos            |
| Calidad C√≥digo       | 20%  | ESLint (0 warnings)          | 20/20 puntos            |
| Rendimiento          | 15%  | Lighthouse (Puntuaci√≥n >95)  | 15/15 puntos            |
| Accesibilidad        | 10%  | axe DevTools (0 violations)  | 10/10 puntos            |
| Documentaci√≥n        | 15%  | Readme + Comentarios         | 15/15 puntos            |
